Who Is Using It?
================

These are some projects using this extension
that you can take a look at to understand how they are configured and what's the behavior.

Setuptools
----------

|:books:| Repository
   https://github.com/pypa/setuptools/

|:art:| Demo
   .. image:: setuptools-usage.gif
      :align: center
      :width: 100%
